original_text: Therefore is the anger of the Lord kindled against his people, and he hath stretched forth his hand against them, and hath smitten them: and the hills did tremble, and their carcases were torn in the midst of the streets. For all this his anger is not turned away, but his hand is stretched out still.
korean_text: 그러므로 여호와께서 자기 백성에게 노를 발하시고 그들 위에 손을 들어 그들을 치신지라 산들은 진동하며 그들의 시체는 거리 가운데에 분토 같이 되었도다 그럴지라도 그의 노가 돌아서지 아니하였고 그의 손이 여전히 펼쳐져 있느니라

sentences.original_text: Therefore is the anger of the Lord kindled
and he hath stretched forth his hand against them
in the midst of the streets
For all this his anger is not turned away
sentences.korean_translation: 이 모든 것에도 불구하고 그의 분노는 돌이켜지지 않았다

sentences.original_text: but his hand is stretched out still
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그의 손은 여전히 뻗어져 있다
